item.description:
We'll probably do 35 miles of biking at a 12-14 mph rate

This is currently a day trip only.

Meet at the beginning of the trail in South Dennis/ Rte 134

I'm told the paved trail is relatively flat as it used to be a railroad line.
I haven't ridden it in several years so I kinda forget :-)

I anticipate that it would take us about 3 1/2 hours with some rest stops.

Bring plenty of water, a bike in good working condition, energy snacks and your sense of humor!

Don't forget a new tube for your bike in case you get a flat!

my cell on the day of the ride is (617) 894-8454

Directions:

Take exit 9a
South on 134
You'll see a shopping plaza
The path is just after the Mobil gas station.
item.name: Cape Cod Rail Trail - S. Dennis, Mass
